expander.first_caption: Our shape-styles are designed to give you a mini shape effect. Crafted out of two layers (double lined) high-quality eco fabric to shape the perfect silhouette. The Shape Effect will make you feel confident and comfortable with your body at all times. We give meticulous attention to the cuts and textures details and use them to your advantage.
expander.second_caption: Active-styles offering the perfect mix of fits, fabrics, and shapes for activities inside the ocean and the miles around it. When the action comes you can focus on what is important;  with our active-styles, you‚Äôll feel confident and relaxed when you need it the most. They provide the right coverage for absolute movement freedom and UPF 50+ UV protection factor to protect your skin. Enjoy the movement!
expander.third_caption: Our tan-styles are crafted for you to get ideal sun exposure and the perfect tan. With little fabric coverage but with full UPF 50+ UV protection factor on the parts you need it. Now is the time for you to get your perfect suntan.

sections.claim: Nosotros confeccionamos trajes de ba√±o de alta costura hechos de redes de pescar
sections.claim_html: Nosotros confeccionamos trajes de ba√±o de alta costura hechos de redes de pescar recuperadas del oceano y otros materiales recyclados
sections.full_banner_1_headline: Costura meticulosa se encuentra con la protecci√≥n al medio ambiente
sections.banner_collection_alt: Eco bikini pouch from 100% recyclable Tyvek¬Æ material included in every order
sections.banner_collection_title: Our package is definitely a keeper!
sections.banner_collection_copy_1: Crafted from 100% recyclable Tyvek¬Æ material. Keep your bikini and personal items safe and dry at all times.  You‚Äôll get our eco bikini pouch with every order. You can buy it separately too, it‚Äôs all up to you.
sections.banner_collection_copy_2: We are always looking on ways on how to reduce waste, in this case, offer waste-free, reusable packaging. Designed for happy oceans. For those days all you want to do is play; in the water, feel the sand on your toes and have a care free day.
sections.principles_banner_1: Un bikini de Woodlike (Free Dive Hipster) elimina 67g de deseschos
sections.collection_banner_1: Figure-flattering, highly-functional fits that mirror the ever-increasing healthy lifestyle of today's conscious woman
sections.principle_banner_2: Woodlike Ocean is a sustainable swimwear label that stands for positive change. The brand represents those favorite memories of endless summer at the beach, sun-kissed skin and salty hair. Gorgeous swimwear committed to creating healthy oceans.
sections.social_title: Toma parte del viaje en Instagram
